attributes.background: Pensioner, 72, who shot dead a burglar in self-defence after he broke into his caravan armed with a meat-hammer and a Molotov cocktail bomb is jailed for ten months for owning a shotgun without a licence. He was protecting himself and his sister from heavily armed intruders into his caravan.
